name: Frantic reload
description:
Armed with a gun which is completely out of control and shoots the most outrageous ammo ever like explosive ducks and the kitchen sink, you must fight back against the cyborgs unleashed on the building and also rescue the stranded scientists

who are falling to their doom.....

Defeat the cyborgs, and get the attention of their boss

Programming and Art :  VCP

Music : Jomakun (https://jomakun.itch.io/)

Sound effects made with BFXR

Controls:

Z : Hold Z to fire

X : Press X to move between the building (you can even stun the cyborgs which shoot at you with this)

Up and Down Arrow : Move to the floor above or below you. (repeatedly press to move quickly between floors)

E : Press E to exit the game (windows version only)

Esc : Press Esc to pause

Made for GMTK 2020, Frantic reload is a shoot-em-up where your ammo changes every time you kill an enemy. Improvise on the fly and try to keep a completely out of control combo as you get back at the cyborgs attacking this building and save the poor scientists because.........reasons......
